definition[0]: to crush something, especially a food that has been cooked, until it is soft and smooth
definition[1]: potatoes that have been boiled and then crushed and mixed with milk until they are smooth
definition[2]: a mixture of malt or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or whisky
definition[3]: a mixture of grain cooked with water to make a food for animals
definition[4]: a very popular US television programme(1972–82), based on Robert Altman’s film of the same name (1970) about a US army medical camp during the  Korean War. Although it treated the subject in a humorous way, it also showed the serious effects that war had on people. The letters stand for ‘Mobile Army Surgical Hospital’.
